website_summaries.verdict: These snacks have a fruity flavor with a juicy center inside a gummy exterior.
pros: Fruit juice in the center of every little snack
Daily dose of vitamin C in each package
Burst of liquid makes for a different gummy eating experience
cons: There are some quality-control issues with delivery and the item may come in a bag rather than a box

customer_reviews.title: I like these better than the other flavor
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband because he likes the other flavor and has a co-worker who get this kind. I like them, he didn't. But he's weird. Overall, these were fresh and chewy. The middles had a juicy center as advertised and a nice berry flavor. I was extremely pleased. He will just have to suffer through them. I highly recommend them, husband only slightly recommends, but like I said, he's weird.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D

customer_reviews.title: I believe this product needs to be reviewed by amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. But on the screen it says it is a 4 pack which make sense for the price you are paying. However, only 28 small packs come in the bag. You can gett a 22 pack of these at Walmart for 4 dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G.

customer_reviews.title: Love Black Forest gummies!
customer_reviews.text: My sons (and my) favorite treat! I can bribe him with these to do just about anything (clean up toys, get in the car..possibilities are endless!) Also, I don’t have serious mom guilt by giving these to him. The ingredients are much better than most competitor gummies. The juicy burst is no Fruit Gusher by any means (I’m a 90’s kid), but they are still good. I keep these and the berry ones on hand at all times for the occasional treat (or bribe, no shame).
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: We all love these!
customer_reviews.text: My kids, hubby and I all love these! They are so good. Super soft and we love the fruity juice taste that pops in the middle when eating. I love that I can trust them without the fake sugar or colors. I carry some in my purse for them, but sometimes even I enjoy snacking on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious little snacks!
customer_reviews.text: These things are delicious! I bought them as snacks for my kids but I’ve been secretly eating them on my own because of how good they are! :)
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimer

customer_reviews.title: These aren’t organic despite packaging tricks..
customer_reviews.text: Its obnoxious that this product is linked to other products that are organic... I would not have purchased them if I had realized that Black Forest produces second rate candies as well as organic and uses nearly the exact same packaging presentation for both their organic candies and these of unknown origin and pesticide content... They taste similar to those gushers candies from the 90’s and have very few candies in each individual package.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Apparently you can get them at Walmart for a quarter of the price
customer_reviews.text: Apparently you can get them at Walmart for a quarter of the price..woops. That being said they weren’t dry or anything they were perfectly supple, soft and juicy on the inside
customer_reviews.author: Laura Robison

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually eat little fruit snacks like these. But I had bought some from my grandchildren Easter Baskets and I tried one of the packets. I am hooked I had to order some for myself. Such a great taste, and I love the little burst of fruit Juice in them
customer_reviews.author: Patria

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: These fruit snacks are the best! I had trouble getting some as my kids scooped them up so quickly. They taste great and are an easy snack to take along just about anywhere. Ill purchase more for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: These candies are ok
customer_reviews.text: These are ok, I've had better, the flavor is different, not bad but not great. These are great to keep in your purse for when the little ones get restless or good for you for a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Can you say Jackpot?!
customer_reviews.text: It kept being sold out every time I went to the storr so I was so happy when I found it cheap on here!
customer_reviews.author: LaBrittany Amu Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very stale gummies
customer_reviews.text: The first pack I opened was very stale and the gummies were hard to chew; thought it was a fluke packet so I opened a second packet and it's the same thing. My guess is the box sat for awhile before it was purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Christina A.

customer_reviews.title: The best fruit snacks!
customer_reviews.text: The BEST fruit snacks! I am pregnant and this has helped with feeling queasy. The perfect portion when you want something sweet. My three year old loves them for a snack as well.
customer_reviews.author: petro277

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is ok
customer_reviews.text: I thought these tasted a little funny. The assorted fruit is much better. I actually had about 6 packs that were opened. It looked like the seal didn’t get glued shut.
customer_reviews.author: Molmor

customer_reviews.title: Juicy burst is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is our new favorite snack candy. The juicy burst inside made this gummy fruit snack so much better. It is a great pick me up snack.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: ... at the grocery store many times and these were great. However
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought these at the grocery store many times and these were great. However; this Box was nasty. They tasted old and were dry. Won’t be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Juicy in the center!
customer_reviews.text: My little grandsons, as well as myself, love these soft fruit snacks with a juicy center!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best gummies ever.
customer_reviews.text: One word: JUICY. If you’re into gummies, they don’t get any better than these. I might need some sort of 12-step program or something, because I can’t seem to stop eating them.
customer_reviews.author: brian s

customer_reviews.title: Remember these are not crack
customer_reviews.text: These are the best in mho. Bursting with juice. Made me drop kick Motts and other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Gee Love

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, good packaging for lunches
customer_reviews.text: You can’t really go wrong here... I mean thy are “so juicy, Ya!”
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Marino-Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Good for a small sweet snack
customer_reviews.text: Enjoyed for the first time, they taste like another type of gushers. Willing to try other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Fidelia H.

customer_reviews.title: Original is better
customer_reviews.text: Some of the berries are a tad sour-not as good as original flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: When they came most were like stale and the juice that’s supposed to be inside hardened or something
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Yummy gummies
customer_reviews.text: They were exactly as described. Yummy, squishy gummies with that good pop of juice in the middle. The kids all loved them.
customer_reviews.author: grlsmkbtrninjas

customer_reviews.title: Not what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They were good, but the juicy part was melted out of the majority of the box. So they were really sticky and basically like the other fruit snacks. Not what I wanted. The ones I had purchased from our vending machines were yummy and juices still inside each fruit, So, not stick and yummy. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Dixon

customer_reviews.title: I can’t eat just one :)
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! Soooo juicy and lots of flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that the Juicy Burst would taste much different from the regular fruit snacks, but it had a lot more flavor and I liked the chewiness better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tastes really good with just the right amount of juice. My son really enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Irene K.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of lemon
customer_reviews.text: So soft and juicy, only bad thing is there seemed to be and exorbitant number of lemon which is my least favor
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute FAVORITE fruit snacks, and I can rarely find them in local stores. When I buy them I have to hide them from everyone else in my house or they are just devoured! They remind me a little of Fruit Gushers. :)
customer_reviews.author: AMP

customer_reviews.title: Expired date
customer_reviews.text: The Gummy’s were dry and very hard I checked the expiration date and it was 01/05/18 probably shouldn’t sell products that shouldn’t be on shelves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy them at the store.
customer_reviews.text: We love these. But the ones we got weren’t fresh. They were hard and the goo in the middle had dried up.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Have bought these before and loved them. Last time sent
customer_reviews.text: Have bought these before and loved them. Last time sent, package was simply a plastic bag, and the snacks appeared to have melted or leaked and tasted stale. Loved them before, but will not buy again. Just not fresh.
customer_reviews.author: BMW

customer_reviews.title: Stale.
customer_reviews.text: These were not fresh at all. Actually pretty gross as far as gummies go.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Pauly

customer_reviews.title: not a fan
customer_reviews.text: these are way too chewy on the outside as opposed to their not liquid filled type which is gummy and i was not a fan of the flavor of them at all. not even organic.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Delicious fruit snacks
customer_reviews.text: Love these fruit snacks!! Great flavor and my kids loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrett Dunston

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are stale and have no juice in the middle as advertised. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Product Tampered With
customer_reviews.text: Packing box arrived intact. However, actual box of fruit snacks arrived open. Counted them and two of the individual packages were missing. Fruit snacks themselves were melted and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Garett

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I sure hope you all get more in, your store is only one that sells these, love them
customer_reviews.author: Cailly

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and gooey!
customer_reviews.text: Love them , use as a treat. Give them to friends, from my purse or a box as gift. I hope I never run out.they are soft and
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kuyasa

customer_reviews.title: Best in the business
customer_reviews.text: Got these on sale for $5. They’ve always been some of my favorites. Can’t go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: DJ Prelim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, even though they are only just fruit snacks ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, even though they are only just fruit snacks everything is exactly what they said and put it to be 10/10 IGN would recommend 😹💯
customer_reviews.author: Devin Hancock

customer_reviews.title: I like to call them Adult Gushers.
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit ridiculous how much I love these! These came in a timely fashion, were still soft (unlike other things I've ordered that melt, or get hard due to the varying temperatures), and were of course delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: It's delicious. It's delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love this fudge there's nothing I don't like and my kids love it, right
customer_reviews.author: Lin00

customer_reviews.title: Soooo Goood!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best fruit snacks my family and u have ever tried. They are like Gushes snacks but healthier. We can't keep enough around!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Cochran

customer_reviews.title: These are THE BEST fruit snacks I've ever tasted
customer_reviews.text: These are THE BEST fruit snacks I've ever tasted, and I consider myself an expert by now LOL. I did send these back unopened though, because I found the same thing in a store for $4.22 and this was like $15.00.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Major

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as much juice liquid as the larger bag in the vending machines.
customer_reviews.author: J K.

customer_reviews.title: Not what description size said.
customer_reviews.text: The description said it was the large bags. When received box it was for the small bags. Still great brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie 5.

customer_reviews.title: GENETICALLY ENGINEERED. STAY AWAY from this product.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known that this was "Produced with Genetic Engineering" I NEVER would have bought this. That's like saying I paid money to kill myself on purpose. If this had been on the FRONT of the box like a significant warning like that SHOULD have been I would never have purchased this item. I also purchased items from this company's ORGANIC line which are specifically NON-GMO and I am quite happy with that. Where is the ZERO stars option
customer_reviews.author: T

product_meta.title: Black Forest Medley Juicy Center Fruit Snacks, Mixed Fruit Flavor, 0.9 Ounce (28 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Mixed Fruit| Size:0.9 Ounce (28 Count)From the Makers of America's Best Tasting Gummy Bear, Black Forest Fruit Medley Flavored Snacks contain juicy centers. Who can pick between the grape, apple, lemon and cherry flavored gummies? They're all delicious. And they're in every pouch of Black Forest Fruit Medleys Fruit Snacks. These juicy filled snacks provide 100 percent daily value of Vitamin C. As every pouch is packed with real fruit juice, the Fruit Medley gummies deliver big time deliciousness. Black Forest thinks you deserve the best…of everything. That’s why we make mouth watering candy using only the most thoughtful, premium ingredients, a ton of passion and a touch of love. Our gluten free and fat free gummies are made with no artificial flavors or colors. We believe in a small batch process that delivers big flavor at a sensible price.
feature_bullets: SO JUICY. SO GOOD: Add a burst of mixed fruit flavor to your day with Black Forest Juicy Bursts: fruit snacks with a liquid center (plus vitamin C!), the perfect sweet treat to add to your kid's lunch box, share with friends, or just treat yourself.

BLACK FOREST FRUIT SNACKS: Black Forest fruit snacks are for kids & kids at heart. Our soft & gummy fruit-flavored candy is gluten free, fat free, & full of authentic juicy flavor you'll feel good about. Go ahead, treat yourself!
GET YOUR SNACK ON: From gummy bears to gummy worms, fruit snacks to sour heads, Black Forest candy is the perfect sweet snack to add flavor to your day. Real fruit flavors, naturally juicy.

TASTE THE DIFFERENCE: What makes Black Forest gummies, fruit chews, & fruit snacks so good? Our classic & organic snacks have real fruit juice, so each gummy bear, chew, or fruit snack is soft, chewy, & fruity.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
